subject: Golf
Olympic Games (2016)
lead_paragraph: The furor over Rory McIlroy’s remarks that he would probably play for Britain in the 2016 Olympics called to mind the reaction to Tiger Woods’s comments about his ethnicity in 1997.
snippet: The furor over Rory McIlroy’s remarks that he would probably play for Britain in the 2016 Olympics called to mind the reaction to Tiger Woods’s comments about his ethnicity in 1997.
